channel.title: 317 [PI] ::yell colors
channel.description: I have everything set up correctly, I believe, but when I yell no matter what I type it just yells "@mag@"..

item.title: 317 [PI] ::yell colors
item.dc:creator: @Zephyrs Zephyrs
item.description:
@Zephyrs wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551019”]Have you considered that your client doesn’t use that color system?

Try <col=16711935>Your text here

16711935 is the number for Magenta (#FF00FF)
I get the color value from this website: http://www.mathsisfun.com/hexadecimal-decimal-colors.html
Use the Decimal color value.[/quote]

Everything in my Client/Server is in @col@.

Read full topic

item.description:

Have you considered that your client doesn’t use that color system?
